comment: , As a hospital worker I consider myself someone who might unnerve others to casually hang around and so have been a hermit outside of the hospital. I don't go anywhere except out for walks near my home and all my food shopping is done online and contactless delivery.

comment: . over at a family member's home for one night so I could spend next day going outdoors to the beach in Maine and enjoying the holiday lights and decorations along the coast. I got so much anxiety about sleeping away in a household of people two of whom work in the retail world.
